description:
AssetManager.rebalance(address,uint256[]) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#507-550) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amountToDeposit == 0 (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#536)

UToken._repayBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,uint256) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#590-662) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- repayAmount == 0 (contracts/market/UToken.sol#599)

UToken.exchangeRateStored() (contracts/market/UToken.sol#456-459) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalSupply_ == 0 (contracts/market/UToken.sol#458)

Comptroller._getInflationIndexNew(uint256,uint256) (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#389-393) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- blockDelta == 0 (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#391)

Comptroller._getRewardsMultiplier(Comptroller.UserManagerAccountState) (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#450-462) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- user.effectiveStaked == 0 (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#452)

UserManager._getEffectiveAmounts(address,uint256) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#905-951) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- coinAge.diff == 0 (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#944-950)

Reentrancy in UToken._repayBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,uint256) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#590-662):
	External calls:
	- IUserManager(userManager).updateLocked(borrower,uint96(repayAmount - interest),false) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#626)
	- IUserManager(userManager).onRepayBorrow(borrower) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#631)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountBorrows[borrower].lastRepay = 0 (contracts/market/UToken.sol#637)
	- accountBorrows[borrower].lastRepay = getBlockNumber() (contracts/market/UToken.sol#640)
	- accountBorrows[borrower].interestIndex = borrowIndex (contracts/market/UToken.sol#653)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [UToken._repayBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,uint256)](contracts/market/UToken.sol#L590-L662):
	External calls:
	- [IUserManager(userManager).updateLocked(borrower,uint96(repayAmount - interest),false)](contracts/market/UToken.sol#L626)
	- [IUserManager(userManager).onRepayBorrow(borrower)](contracts/market/UToken.sol#L631)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [accountBorrows[borrower].lastRepay = 0](contracts/market/UToken.sol#L637)
	- [accountBorrows[borrower].lastRepay = getBlockNumber()](contracts/market/UToken.sol#L640)
	- [accountBorrows[borrower].interestIndex = borrowIndex](contracts/market/UToken.sol#L653)

description:
Reentrancy in UToken.borrow(address,uint256) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#514-560):
	External calls:
	- remaining = assetManagerContract.withdraw(underlying,to,amount) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#535)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountBorrows[msg.sender].principal += actualAmount + fee (contracts/market/UToken.sol#544)
	- accountBorrows[msg.sender].interest = accountBorrowsNew - newPrincipal (contracts/market/UToken.sol#546)
	- accountBorrows[msg.sender].interestIndex = borrowIndex (contracts/market/UToken.sol#547)
	- totalBorrows = totalBorrowsNew (contracts/market/UToken.sol#548)

	External calls:

	- [accountBorrows[msg.sender].interest = accountBorrowsNew - newPrincipal](contracts/market/UToken.sol#L546)
	- [accountBorrows[msg.sender].interestIndex = borrowIndex](contracts/market/UToken.sol#L547)
	- [totalBorrows = totalBorrowsNew](contracts/market/UToken.sol#L548)

description:
Reentrancy in AssetManager.withdraw(address,address,uint256) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#327-369):
	External calls:
	- IERC20Upgradeable(token).safeTransfer(account,withdrawAmount) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#341)
	- supply = moneyMarket.getSupply(token) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#351)
	- moneyMarket.withdraw(token,account,withdrawAmount_scope_0) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#355)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender][token] = balances[msg.sender][token] - amount + remaining (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#362)
	- totalPrincipal[token] = totalPrincipal[token] - amount + remaining (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#363)
markdown:

	- [supply = moneyMarket.getSupply(token)](contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#L351)
	- [moneyMarket.withdraw(token,account,withdrawAmount_scope_0)](contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#L355)
	State variables written after the call(s):

description:
Reentrancy in Comptroller.withdrawRewards(address,address) (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#223-256):
	External calls:
	- (user,userInfo,pastBlocks) = _getUserInfo(userManager,account,token,0) (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#227-232)
		- (user.effectiveStaked,user.effectiveLocked,user.isMember) = userManager.onWithdrawRewards(account,pastBlocks) (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#342-345)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- users[account][token].updatedBlock = block.number (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#242)
	- users[account][token].inflationIndex = gInflationIndex (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#243)
	- users[account][token].accrued = amount (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#251)

description:
PureTokenAdapter._supportsToken(address) (contracts/asset/PureTokenAdapter.sol#192-196) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- tokenAddress != address(0) && IERC20Upgradeable(tokenAddress).balanceOf(address(this)) >= 0 (contracts/asset/PureTokenAdapter.sol#195)
markdown:
[PureTokenAdapter._supportsToken(address)](contracts/asset/PureTokenAdapter.sol#L192-L196) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- [tokenAddress != address(0) && IERC20Upgradeable(tokenAddress).balanceOf(address(this)) >= 0](contracts/asset/PureTokenAdapter.sol#L195)

description: AaveV3Adapter.withdraw(address,address,uint256) (contracts/asset/AaveV3Adapter.sol#228-242) ignores return value by lendingPool.withdraw(tokenAddress,tokenAmount,recipient) (contracts/asset/AaveV3Adapter.sol#234-238)

AaveV3Adapter.withdrawAll(address,address) (contracts/asset/AaveV3Adapter.sol#250-266) ignores return value by lendingPool.withdraw(tokenAddress,type()(uint256).max,recipient) (contracts/asset/AaveV3Adapter.sol#258-262)
AaveV3Adapter.claimRewards(address,address) (contracts/asset/AaveV3Adapter.sol#273-278) ignores return value by market.claimAllRewards(assets,recipient) (contracts/asset/AaveV3Adapter.sol#277)
AssetManager.rebalance(address,uint256[]) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#507-550) ignores return value by moneyMarket.withdrawAll(tokenAddress,address(this)) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#526)
AssetManager.rebalance(address,uint256[]) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#507-550) ignores return value by moneyMarket_scope_1.deposit(tokenAddress) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#538)
AssetManager.rebalance(address,uint256[]) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#507-550) ignores return value by lastMoneyMarket.deposit(tokenAddress) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#546)
UserManager.stake(uint96) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#694-715) ignores return value by comptroller.withdrawRewards(msg.sender,stakingToken) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#697)
UserManager.unstake(uint96) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#724-744) ignores return value by comptroller.withdrawRewards(msg.sender,stakingToken) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#731)
UserManager.withdrawRewards() (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#749-751) ignores return value by comptroller.withdrawRewards(msg.sender,stakingToken) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#750)

UserManager.debtWriteOff(address,address,uint96) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#763-827) ignores return value by comptroller.updateTotalStaked(stakingToken,totalStaked - totalFrozen) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#824)

UserManager.batchUpdateFrozenInfo(address[]) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#1034-1054) ignores return value by comptroller.updateTotalStaked(stakingToken,totalStaked - totalFrozen) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#1053)
